data.lyric:
[ti:idontwannabeyouanymore]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:dont smile at me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]idontwannabeyouanymore - Billie Eilish
[00:05.78]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:11.56]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:17.34]Don't be that way
[00:20.15]
[00:20.85]Fall apart twice a day
[00:25.06]I just wish you could feel what you say
[00:31.51]
[00:34.20]Show never tell
[00:36.98]
[00:37.70]But I know you too well
[00:41.22]
[00:42.03]Kind of mood that you wish you could sell
[00:48.61]
[00:50.89]If teardrops could be bottled
[00:54.71]There'd be swimming pools filled by models
[00:58.94]Told "A tight dress is what makes you a w***e"
[01:05.67]
[01:07.50]If I love you was a promise
[01:11.72]Would you break it if you're honest
[01:15.90]Tell the mirror what you know she's heard before
[01:21.69]
[01:25.15]I don't wanna be you anymore
[01:35.42]
[01:42.34]Hands getting cold
[01:45.62]Losing feeling's getting old
[01:48.75]
[01:49.93]Was I made from a broken mold
[01:58.12]
[01:58.99]Hurt I can't shake
[02:01.86]
[02:02.62]We've made every mistake
[02:06.26]
[02:06.80]Only you know the way that I break
[02:14.60]
[02:15.56]If teardrops could be bottled
[02:19.41]There'd be swimming pools filled by models
[02:23.64]Told "A tight dress is what makes you a w***e"
[02:31.68]
[02:32.27]If I love you was a promise
[02:36.41]Would you break it if you're honest
[02:40.63]Tell the mirror what you know she's heard before
[02:46.41]
[02:49.91]I don't wanna be you
[02:56.03]
[02:58.33]I don't wanna be you
[03:04.17]
[03:06.81]I don't wanna be you anymore
data.trans:
[ti:idontwannabeyouanymore]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:dont smile at me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.78]//
[00:11.56]//
[00:17.34]不要这样
[00:20.15]
[00:20.85]一天之内崩溃两次
[00:25.06]多么希望你能感受到这话中的情真意切
[00:31.51]
[00:34.20]可这样的场面话 你永远不会说
[00:36.98]
[00:37.70]我太了解你了
[00:41.22]
[00:42.03]你总是希望你是受追捧的那一个
[00:48.61]
[00:50.89]如果将我的泪水收集起来
[00:54.71]那么它将填满无数个游泳池
[00:58.94]你说我穿着那件紧身裙看起来十分放荡
[01:05.67]
[01:07.50]如果我爱你是你的承诺
[01:11.72]说实话 你是否会打破这个承诺
[01:15.90]对着镜子说说那些曾使我心碎不已的话吧 看看你有多残忍
[01:21.69]
[01:25.15]我不想再像你这样
[01:35.42]
[01:42.34]我的双手变得越来越冷
[01:45.62]对你的激情也渐渐退却
[01:48.75]
[01:49.93]我早已遍体鳞伤 支离破碎
[01:58.12]
[01:58.99]无法再承受任何伤害
[02:01.86]
[02:02.62]我们之间的一切都是个错误
[02:06.26]
[02:06.80]只有你能把我伤得体无完肤
[02:14.60]
[02:15.56]如果将我的泪水收集起来
[02:19.41]那么它将填满无数个游泳池
[02:23.64]你说我穿着那件紧身裙看起来十分放荡
[02:31.68]
[02:32.27]如果我爱你是你的承诺
[02:36.41]说实话 你是否会打破这个承诺
[02:40.63]对着镜子说说那些曾使我心碎不已的话吧 看看你有多残忍
[02:46.41]
[02:49.91]我不想像你这样
[02:56.03]
[02:58.33]我不想像你这样
[03:04.17]
[03:06.81]我不想再像你这样
